My Creative Process

All of my projects have a creative process to ensure i get the result that i am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

I like to start the project discussing exactly what my clients needs and wants are.

2

Planning

I plan out the website interface by drawing a rough copy

3

Interaction

I go over the rough copy with my client

4

Complete the project

I complete the project
